name: Ryan Bergara
bio: Just a guy with a penchant for horror, but no-one to share my interest with. Please join my quest for some real tasty gore. Oh, and popcorn are my thing... So if we share, it will have to be a big ass bucket...

name: Carlos Santana
bio: Don't know shit about movies. Just lonely.

name: Pat Carroll
bio: A good ass score... Aaand maybe some singing along. That's my thing. But none of my friends can sing for the life of them. Please help!

name: Margrethe Vestager
bio: I have a tendency to talk during movies, so I hope you can live with that. I also like to discuss a movie afterwards, so hopefully you are up for that!

name: Kirsten Rolffes
bio: I love, love, looove horror... Preferably related to the supernatural, please and thank you.
